channel.title: Erdogan on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Erdogan on PepsFeeder

item.title: Trump's policy in Syria could reorganize the state
item.description: US President Donald Trump’s “reactionary” foreign policy would bring the Islamic State back to Syria, writer Kim Seggupta says. One of the hallmarks of Trump’s foreign policy is his lack of success against adversaries and his failure to stand by allies, the writer adds in an article in The Independent.

item.title: What makes Trump obedient to Erdogan?
item.description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan often finds a listening ear from US President Donald Trump and the relationship is unusual, during which the Turkish president is used to persuading Trump to take positions that put him at odds with his national security aides and his Republican allies, The New York Times said.

item.title: Turkish's special Forces units continue to advance in the eastern Euphrates region
item.description: This came in a statement published by the ministry on the operation launched by Turkey on Wednesday northeastern Syria, with a statement attached to the scenes of the progress of these forces.
